document.title: Pellete de liens du 11-06-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Cardstacker Gallery Les constructions en cartes a jouer les plus grandes du monde. (Tags: fun debile haha )
mod_rewrite rewriterule generator :: Webmaster Toolkit Our mod_rewrite RewriteRule generator will take a dynamic url given to it, and generate the correct syntax to place in a .htaccess file to allow the url to be rewritten in a spiderable format. (Tags: apache )
Envoyer de l'application/xhtml+xml avec la negociation de contenu d'Apache - Genezys : Humeurs d'un codeur Envoyer de l'application/xhtml+xml avec la negociation de contenu d'Apache (Tags: apache http xhtml )
Simple PHP Blog - Project Homepage Welcome to the Simple PHP Blog web site. This site is dedicated to the development of the Simple PHP Blog (SPHPBlog) software. I started this project because I wanted a dead-simple blog. Something that didn't require a database, used flat text files, and looked nice. (Tags: php blogms )
slayeroffice | tools | Mouseover DOM Inspector v2.0 Help The Mouseover DOM Inspector, or MODI for short, is a favelet (also known as a bookmarklet) that allows you to view and manipulate the DOM of a web page simply by mousing around the document. (Tags: javascript css conception audit webmastering online.tools )
Whois Source - Wildcard Domain Search Lookup Whois Source: Domain name search lookup that allows a wildcard search of all current/deleted/expired whois domains. (Tags: dns domaines registrar online.tools nic whois )
Firemarks - Share Your Bookmarks ! Online bookmarks sharing (Tags: bookmarks online-tools )
